bill.title: Mississippi S.A.F.E. Mortgage Act; amend provisions and extend repealer.
bill.description: An Act To Reenact Sections 81-18-1 Through 81-18-63, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Known As The "mississippi S.a.f.e. Mortgage Licensing Act Of 2009"; To Amend Reenacted Section 81-18-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Short Title Of The Act; To Amend Reenacted Section 81-18-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify The Definition Of The Terms "borrower," "mortgage Loan Originator" And "qualifying Individual"; To Amend Reenacted Section 81-18-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt Certain Small Loan Licensees From The Provisions Of The Act; To Amend Reenacted Section 81-18-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Expiration Date Of Certain Licenses; To Amend Reenacted Section 81-18-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Notification Requirements To The Department Of Banking And Consumer Finance For A Licensee's Change In Address, Location Or Officers; To Amend Reenacted Section 81-18-23, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise Reporting Requirements By Mortgage Licensees; To Amend Reenacted Section 81-18-51, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Date Of Repeal Of The Act; To Amend Reenacted Sections 81-18-9, 81-18-13, 81-18-14 And 81-18-33, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Business and Financial Institutions
